summary: The Skyrim vanilla night is kinda 'blah'. The stars are too big, too few in number, and not very nice to look at. They're just...you kow...THERE. And the milky is just as lack-luster. Skyrim Enhanced Night Sky fixes this problem!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71638-0-1448747872.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][size=3][color=#ffd966]Features[/color][/size][/b]
The Skyrim vanilla night is kinda 'blah'. The stars are too big, too few in number, and not very nice to look at. They're just...you kow...THERE. And the galaxy (based on the Milky Way) is just as lack-luster. Skyrim Enhanced Night Sky fixes this problem! The screenshots are taken using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71287?]Eidolon ENB[/url].

The default galaxy is replaced with the massive hi-res creation by Yuril. And the stars were created from real images by CptJoker - and the stars DO twinkle!

[color=#cc0000]For more information, please read the included README-Credits.txt file![/color]


[color=#ffd966][size=3]Compatibility[/size][/color]
Skyrim Enhanced Night Sky looks GREAT with vanilla Skyrim, and is compatible with ALL mods and ALL ENB presets. I created this mod as a compilation to enhance the night time look and feel of my Eidolon ENB, and it is found in the optional section of Eidolon ENB's download page.

[color=#ffd966][size=3]Installation[/size][/color]
It is best to install this with a mod manager such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url].

To manually install, simply copy the textures directory and paste it into your skyrim DATA folder. Merge if asked to do so.

To uninstall after manual installation, delete these two files:

[color=#00ffff]../Data/Textures/Sky/skyrimgalaxy.dds[/color]
[color=#00ffff]..Data/Textures/Sky/skystars.dds[/color]

[color=#ffd966][size=3]My Other Mods[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71649?]Skyrim Complete Weather Overhaul[/url] - It does for the Skyrim's weather what this mod does for Skyrim's night time sky!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71287?]Eidolon ENB[/url] - This is my personal ENB Preset. Feature-rich, I tune and update it regularly! It supports Night Eye!

[color=#ffd966][size=3]Credits[/size][/color]
I would like to thank Yuril and CptJoker for allowing me compile and then distribute their work in this mod.

The star field is taken from CptJoker's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85/?]Enhanced Night Skyrim[/url]
The galaxy is taken from Yuril's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25503/?]Amazing Nebula[/url]
author: Visitant
